org.gradoop.flink.model.api.layouts

Interface LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - type of the graph head
    V - the vertex type
    E - the edge type
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseLayoutFactory<G,V,E>, ElementFactoryProvider<G,V,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVEGraphLayoutFactory, IndexedGVEGraphLayoutFactory

    public interface LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge>
extends BaseLayoutFactory<G,V,E>
    Enables the construction of a LogicalGraphLayout.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> createEmptyGraph()
      Creates a layout representing the empty graph.
      LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromCollections(Collection<V> vertices, Collection<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph layout from the given vertex and edge collections.
      LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromCollections(G graphHead, Collection<V> vertices, Collection<E> edges)
      Creates a logical graph layout from the given graphHead, vertex and edge collections.

      Creates a logical graph layout from given graphHead, vertex and edge datasets.
      LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices)
      Creates a logical graph layout from the given vertex dataset.

      Creates a logical graph layout from given vertex and edge datasets.
      LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHeads, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices, Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
      Creates a graph layout from the given datasets indexed by label.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.flink.model.api.layouts.BaseLayoutFactory

        setGradoopFlinkConfig

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.common.model.api.entities.ElementFactoryProvider

    • Method Detail

      • fromDataSets

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices)
        Creates a logical graph layout from the given vertex dataset.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertex dataset
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • fromDataSets

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices,
                                       org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph layout from given vertex and edge datasets. The method creates a new graph head element and assigns the vertices and edges to that graph.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertex DataSet
        edges - Edge DataSet
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • fromDataSets

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromDataSets(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G> graphHead,
                                       org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V> vertices,
                                       org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph layout from given graphHead, vertex and edge datasets. The method assumes that the given vertices and edges are already assigned to the given graph head.
        Parameters:
        graphHead - 1-element GraphHead DataSet
        vertices - Vertex DataSet
        edges - Edge DataSet
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • fromIndexedDataSets

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromIndexedDataSets(Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<G>> graphHeads,
                                              Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<V>> vertices,
                                              Map<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<E>> edges)
        Creates a graph layout from the given datasets indexed by label. The method assumes that the given vertices and edges are already assigned to the given graph head.
        Parameters:
        graphHeads - 1-element Mapping from label to GraphHead DataSet
        vertices - Mapping from label to vertex dataset
        edges - Mapping from label to edge dataset
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • fromCollections

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromCollections(G graphHead,
                                          Collection<V> vertices,
                                          Collection<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph layout from the given graphHead, vertex and edge collections. The method assumes that the given vertices and edges are already assigned to the given graph head.
        Parameters:
        graphHead - Graph head associated with the logical graph
        vertices - Vertex collection
        edges - Edge collection
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • fromCollections

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> fromCollections(Collection<V> vertices,
                                          Collection<E> edges)
        Creates a logical graph layout from the given vertex and edge collections. A new graph head is created and all vertices and edges are assigned to that graph.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertex collection
        edges - Edge collection
        Returns:
        Logical graph layout

      • createEmptyGraph

        LogicalGraphLayout<G,V,E> createEmptyGraph()
        Creates a layout representing the empty graph.
        Returns:
        empty graph
